segue_the_chain: Peter Buck of R.E.M. was associated with an air rage incident, as was Ian Brown…

segue_dave.line: R.E.M. broke up in 2011, while Amy Winehouse ended her music career in the same year...
segue_dave.explanation: R.E.M. was formed as a band in 2011 and Amy Winehouse ended her carrer in the music industry in the same year.
